Service Details: - Helps alleviate some of the transportation costs for eligible BC residents who must travel within the province for physician referred non-emergency medical specialist services not available in their own community- Program is a corporate sponsorship between the Ministry of Health and private transportation carriers- Coordinated by the Ministry of Health Services and the transportation partners who agree to waive or discount their regular fees
Eligibility: Please refer to the website for information regarding patient eligibility and escort eligibility
How to Apply: Visit the website for information on the application process
Address & Map: Travel Assistance Program1515 Blanshard StVictoria, BC     V8W 3C8View MapQuest Map
